title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for conclusion with reason

v(5.5) = -0.45337, a(5.5) = -1.35851

The speed is increasing at time t = 5.5, because velocity and acceleration have the same sign.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for considering v(t) = 0

1 point is earned for integral

1 point is earned for the answer

v(t) = 0 when t = 5.19552. Let b = 5.19552.

v(t) changes sign from positive to negative at time t = b.

x(b)=2+ ∫ 0 b v(t)dt=14.134 or 14.135 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiEaiaacI cacaWGIbGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaikdacqGHRaWkdaWdXaqaaiaadAha caGGOaGaamiDaiaacMcacaWGKbGaamiDaiabg2da9iaaigdacaaI0a GaaiOlaiaaigdacaaIZaGaaGinaiaabccacaqGVbGaaeOCaiaabcca caqGXaGaaeinaiaab6cacaqGXaGaae4maiaabwdaaSqaaiaaicdaae aacaWGIbaaniabgUIiYdaaaa@51A2@
